function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

setInitialStates(

From the manufacturer

New Sprouts Fix It!

Give your little fixer everything they need to complete pretend construction and repair jobs with New Sprouts Fix It!, one of the popular pretend play activity sets from Learning Resources!

Pretend Tools for Little Hands!

Sized for little hands, this set’s five toddler-safe tools include a pretend saw, screwdriver, hammer, wrench, and drill!

Imaginative Fix-It Adventures!

Made from chunky plastic, these pretend tools add a touch of realism to all kinds of imaginative playâ€”the drill even makes noise!

Toolbox for Storage!

When repairs are finished for the day, all of the tools store safely inside the included tool box until the next game of pretend.

Ages & Stages

Imaginative Skills

Let imaginations soar with this toy that builds creativity and social skills through immersive role play!

Hand Strength

Give little hands the strength they need to hold a pencil, play on the playground, and more with this fun hands-on toy!

Social Skills

Kids develop social-emotional learning skills with this toy’s fun activities that support healthy emotions and communication!

Building Someone Amazing

When the toy you choose is from Learning Resources, you’re helping your child build who they will become – whether an architect, an A student, or just an all-around awesome kid!

TOY TOOLS: Little tools for big imaginary projects. Surprise your children with this toddler tool set
TODDLER-SAFE TOOLS: Encourage imaginative play with toddler-safe tools made from durable, soft plastic
TODDLER TOOLBOX INCLUDES: Includes saw, hammer, screwdriver, wrench, drill, and toolbox
REALISTIC SOUNDS: Squeeze the drill and it makes sounds
Give the Gift of Learning: Whether youâ€™re shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift!
Kids’ Toys for Stocking Stuffers!: From fidget toys and board games to puzzles and beyond, our screen-free learning and education toys make the perfect Christmas gifts for boys and girls!

The rules are simple, just use the rubber band to bounce the chess you own through the goal to reach ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:29:18 UTC – Details)



MEDIUM SIZE SET: Fast sling puck game is a game that both children and adults can play. Medium size table game toy is more for children over 6 years old. The rules are simple, just use the rubber band to bounce the chess you own through the goal to reach the opponent’s area, and you are the winner if you hit all the chess pieces first. (SIZE: 14*9*1.2 in)
DEVELOP CHILDREN’S ABILITIES: Sling puck game is a fast-paced game. It can improve children’s concentration, hand-eye coordination and rapid response ability in fast and concentrated hits, and can keep children away from video games temporarily. This slingshot game toy can also enhance a child’s sense of competition.
HIGH QUALITY SOLID WOODEN: Wooden hockey table game toy use high-quality solid wood frames to make chess pieces and chessboards, which are durable and smooth. The surface is smooth and will not hurt the player’s hands. It can also make the chess pieces slide more smoothly. The chessboard adopts professional tenon and tenon structure can make it stronger.
FAMILY FUN OR PARTY GAME: As a desktop battle board game toy pursuing speed, it is suitable for colleague dinners, friends gathering, family entertainment, can promote colleague relations, enhance parent-child interaction which is an active atmosphere toy. Let us enjoy a relaxing leisure time with family and friends!
IDEAL GIFT FOR KIDS & ADULTS: Wooden sling hockey board game is a toy for all ages. Table game toy is made of wood, adhering to the concept of environmental protection and recyclability, without batteries. It can be used as a childâ€™s birthday gift or as a holiday gift. Package includes: 1 chess board, 10 chess pieces, Christmas special edition box!

The Party (game): This is the 100% offline text message party game where players compete to create the funniest text message thread.
Designed for 17+: This game contains mature content and is designed for ages 17+. Encouraged to be played with 3+ players.
How To Play: Players rotate drawing a sent (or â€œinboxâ€) card while the rest of the group competes to play the funniest reply card. Once everyone in the group has played their chosen reply card, the judge decides which combo is the funniest. That person gets a point. The person with the most cards at the end, wins.
What’s Inside: Includes 240 Inbox cards and 300 Reply cards plus instructions
Brought to you by What Do You Meme?: We also make other party games inspired by pop culture. Check out our store for more good stuff.

*Clicker Training Progress

1. Issued a password to the dog, such as lay down, play dead, pick Frisbee, jump through hoops, etc.

2. Waiting for Dog to make right moves

3. Click

4. Treat dog, such as food

Note:

You must “Treat dog, such as food”

And be patient, it may take some time

Clicker Training is such a win-win way of training, not so much training methods, as it is a game, people play with dogs.

* About the product

âˆš A brand new happy communication mode with the pet.

âˆš Not only train the dog but also the cat, bird, chicken, sheep and even mouse. Must-have training tool for sound-sensitive pets.

âˆš The clicker training can train the dog house-trained, basic obedience, small trick, and correct the bad behavior.

âˆš Button for easy clicking and loud sound.

âˆš By pressing the yellow button the clicker makes a distinct and recognizable sound designed to get your dogs attention and become a familiar indicator of a job well done

âˆš These training clickers are contoured to fit your hand and each comes with a wristband for your convenience

*Package Include

2 different colors: Blue, Black, each color 1 PCS

â–¼Can be used to train the dog basic obedience, small trick, and correct the bad behavior; Scientific method of training your pet safely and easily.
â–¼Stop barking and dog obdeience. Train your dog quiqly just by simply pressing the clicker and command.
Well constructed and durable, metal clicker will not rust or break.
Big button for easy clicking and loud sound. Easy to use in any position.

Christmas Star Waterfall String Lights – Indoor and Outdoor Decor

Outdoor waterfall star string lights will light up your Christmas and holidays! Comes with 16.4′ extension cord, upgraded 11″ Iron Top Star and 9 strands of 10′ long string lights. You can hang this meteor Christmas light on your roof or tree top. Perfect for decorating Christmas trees, backyards, porches, patios, gardens, walls, windows, bedrooms, living rooms, weddings and parties, etc. It is also an ideal gift for family and friends.

What makes us stand out
more durable material (won’t break)
Longer lasting (lasts at least 10 vacations)
Neat wires won’t get crimped or twisted
Energy saving (almost no power consumption)
Safer (UL listed, low voltage output, cool to the touch)
Suitable for indoor and outdoor (IP44 waterproof)
feature:

8 Lighting Modes: Combo, Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chase/Flash, Slow Fade, Blink/Flash and Always On

Christmas, Wedding, Engagement, New Year, Valentine’s Day, Anniversary, Birthday Party, Sweet Emotions and more

This is a set of weatherproof string lights designed for inclement weather and suitable for all seasons. But be aware that the plugs are not waterproof, you’ll need to do some protection or keep them out of the water.

Good choice for Christmas
ã€8 Lighting Modesã€‘Christmas Waterfall Lights have 8 different light modes: Combination, Wave, Sequential, Slow Glow, Chasing/Blinking, Slow/Fader, Blinking/Blinking, Steady Lighting Like a beautiful star falling on you in front of. What’s even more amazing is that the stars can twinkle from the bottom up, and you can enjoy a meteor shower feast on Christmas!
ã€Powerful Memory Functionã€‘The Christmas waterfall light has a memory function. The built-in memory chip will save your last mode setting, no need to reset the mode every time, when you restart, the memory function will be restored from the previous setting mode. How convenient!
ã€EASY TO USE AND SAFEã€‘Just hang the big star on the exterior wall, tree or eaves, then hang the 9 star string lights to the ground. Then we unfold each light wire and fix it to the ground. It’s that easy! The UL listed plug and low temperature LED bulb ensure it is safe to touch even after prolonged use. Save you time and effort. Safer to use!
ã€Waterfall light for multiple scenesã€‘: Waterfall light is IP44 outdoor waterproof design, it can work normally even in cold winter. This large LED outdoor Christmas decoration can be hung on eaves, porches and trees. Perfect for Christmas decorations, Thanksgiving, Weddings, Valentine’s Day and more. This is the most classic style, illuminates eaves, trees, walls, decks, balconies, Christmas trees to create a charming atmosphere.
ã€No Risk Investmentã€‘Our products will surely attract your love after continuous improvement. If you have any questions, you can contact us by email. We will give you a satisfactory answer within 24 hours. If you don’t think your investment today is worth a penny, we’ll give you a full refund.

Shop Grandpa Beckâ€™s Games!

Shop Grandpa Beckâ€™s Games!

Shop Grandpa Beckâ€™s Games!

IT’S MAGICALLY MALICIOUS: Cover Your Kingdom is an absurdly competitive and hilarious game. It’s perfect for parties and will be enjoyed by kids, teens, and adults alike
PLAY WITH 2-8 RULERS: Whether your game group is large or small, this game fits the bill. It brings out the inner Bragon of each player and is going to be a blast with rules that modify the game to fit your group size
ADAPT IT TO YOUR GROUP: We make our games fun for all skill levels! You can choose to play the core game -or- add in the 2 included expansions for more advanced play -or- dial back the rules for younger (or older) players.
COVER YOUR ASSETS DEVIOUS BROTHER: Cover Your Kingdom is an adaptation to our wildly popular game, Cover Your Assets. This version adds layers of new strategy and fun without much added complexity.
GUARANTEED FUN: Learning a new game should be fun, not frustrating! With detailed rules, how to play videos, and our family standing by to answer questions we do everything we can to make game night great!

DELL 7050MT is a Mini Tower computer. This device is easy to upgrade with additional RAM and storage but have little to no expandability. Usually models with this chassis have an optional Wi-Fi and Bluetooth module and an M.2 slot for an SSD.
Features: 

CPU: Intel Quad Core i7-7700 3.60GHz to 4.20GHz, 4 cores, 8 threads
CPU Cache: 8 MB

Operating system: Windows 10 Pro

Memory: 32GB DDR4

Hard Drive: New 1TB NVMe SSD + 2TB HDD

Video Card: N/A

USB 3.0 Ports: 6
USB 2.0 Ports: 4

Display Port: 2

VGA Port: 0

HDMI: 1

Ethernet: x1 Lan Port

Serial Port: 0

WIFI &Bluetooth:Built-in WIFI & Bluetooth

Mouse/Keyboard:Wireless Keyboard & Mouse
What’s Included:
1 x DELL 7050 Tower Desktop
1 x Brand New Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo
1 x Power Cord
Powerful 7th Gen Processor – The DELL 7050 Tower computer driven by the Intel Core 7th Generation i7-7700 Processor (4 Core, 8 Threads, 8MB, 3.60GHz, Up to 4.20GHz) enables increased power and productivity.
Microsoft Windows 10 Pro – This DELL Tower Computer Pre-installed with the Windows 10 Professional operating system.
Superior memory – Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, Oversized 32GB DDR4 memory with Strictly selected particles.
Brand New 1TB M.2 NVMe Solid State Drive – The DELL 7050 Tower Computer comes with Brand New 1TB M.2 NVMe SSD to store important files and applications, support more faster Boot speed and faster storage rates.
Video Ports – This DELL 7050 Tower comes with 6x USB 3.0, 4x USB 2.0, 2 x display ports. Wireless keyboard & mouse are included.
